titles.title: Angels We Have Heard On High

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Gloria, in excelsis Deo! newline Gloria, in excelsis Deo!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Angels we have heard on high, newline Sweetly singing o'er the plains; newline And the mountains in reply, newline Echoing their joyous strains.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Shepherds, why this jubilee? newline Why your joyous strains prolong? newline Say what may the tidings be; newline Which inspire your heav'nly song?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Come to Bethlehem and see, newline Him whose birth the angels sing; newline Come adore on bended knee, newline Christ the Lord, the newborn King.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: See within a manger laid, newline Jesus, Lord of heav'n and earth; newline Mary, Joseph, lend your aid, newline With us sing our Savior's birth.
